title: Practical Development of Online Curricula and Courseware

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and Online Learning Platform Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen online curriculum development capabilities in science fields, offering practical and flexible development experiences through iterative incremental and agile methodologies

learning_goals: Explaining online curriculum development phases as four stages based on the DONC² model
Participating in courseware prototype improvements through ≥3 iterative cycles (Sprints) using Agile development methods
Exchanging real-time feedback with external development teams using collaborative tools (online whiteboards, project management software)
Team-based production of completed science mini-courseware (3-lesson modules) through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
